jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer II
jobs.description: Built and maintained 20 websites across the world through collaboration within the development team. Improved customer experience by launching new features and fixing current issues.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive suite of RESTful web API endpoints in Node.js to proficiently manage a variety of HTTP requests. Collaborated closely with the production team to conceptualize and execute user-friendly features, resulting in a significant boost in user engagement and acquisition.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: Engineered a cutting-edge website showcasing a robust social media aggregation system, seamlessly collating user content from Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram, storing and presenting it in a sleek and unified newsfeed. Spearheaded the development of the server, database collection, and client interface, leveraging technologies such as Node.js, Vue.js, Express, Axios, and HTML/CSS to achieve this innovative solution.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
jobs.description: Collaborated seamlessly with the front-end team to craft a sophisticated and user-centric interface, taking a hands-on approach to coding the front-end while also actively contributing to enhancing the back-end website's performance in close coordination with the development team.
